Articles.Content:
Hey, hello folks.

Any one know this? (tittle program name)

Is anybody already using it?

Let me know, i'm starting with it, to my work too, but primary to My mod parts. (signature).

Look for the 6th video, that part for adjust colors and labels directly on Unity, i wanna try that to use inside KSP, like i see on mode or two already done similar to that.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-07T16:36:24Z" title="04/07/2015 04:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 7, 2015</time> by Climberfx**

been meaning to take it up into my toolset. Looks more a little more intuitive than Quixel Suite. But I won't have time to for a while though. It'll really shine if/when KSP finally uses some shaders newer than SM2.0.

The pricetag makes it a little less accessible. the previous version of dDo/nDo is available now for free.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-07T21:24:13Z" title="04/07/2015 09:24  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 7, 2015</time> by nli2work**

Check out in allegorithmic site, have a month subscription, "Substance Live Indie", that i thing is a fair price.

I;m i love of this tool set, the painter and the design.
